title: The Sicilian Bastard
description: She was lost and alone in the world. He was her white knight in tarnished armor. Together, theyâ€™ll create a powerful alliance.Araceli Doe, a stripper in Las Vegas, has no memories of her past life. She's fine with the day-to-day monotony, until Luciano Picone walks into her club and her entire life is thrown into a tailspin.As their passion grows, Araceli's memories start to come back, and what she sees isn't pretty. Luciano isn't the only monster she's fighting. Can she face her demons, or will she succumb?Publisher's Note: This is a dark mafia romance containing graphic scenes that could be triggers and power exchange.
author: Selena Michaels
